column4: hi sorry to ask a windows question here... but my windows drive shat tiself and thus had to revert to y trusty linux ubuntu back up...what coomands are avail to me in the terminal to do some sort of chkdsk on te windows volume before i erase it!
i donno if you can chkdsk but you can try to mount it
it mounts ok and i can explore it.. well some of it before it locks up the entire computer...i think there maybe a physical error on it
might want to get rid of it then, but I'm probably not the best person to ask about this... If there's nothing irreplaceable on it i'd reformat
